episode_event_sv_egg/4001_1001_0300_10:
Nemona is helping me research Pokémon
from the Paldea region, right here in my lab.
episode_event_sv_egg/4001_1001_0400_10: So we’ve been hatching a lot of Eggs, but...
episode_event_sv_egg/4001_1001_0600_10:
And of course, if you hatch any Pokémon you
particularly like, you can partner up with them!
episode_event_sv_egg/4001_0401_0800_10:
Aha! I see you’re interested in Pokémon from
Paldea, too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_sv_egg/4001_0402_1000_10: Aha, I knew you’d be interested!
episode_event_sv_egg/4001_1001_1100_10:
Let me introduce you to the Pokémon that will
hatch from the Eggs!
episode_event_sv_egg/4001_1001_1200_10:
That’s Sprigatito, the Grass Cat Pokémon! It can
use its plant powers to soak up whatever water
you throw at it!
episode_event_sv_egg/4001_1001_1300_10:
That’s Fuecoco, the Fire Croc Pokémon! The
burning-hot sparks it scatters will fry any
and all plants in a flash!
episode_event_sv_egg/4001_1001_1400_10:
That’s Quaxly, the Duckling Pokémon! It may seem
quiet, but its mighty streams of water can put out
any fire—you’ll see!
episode_event_sv_egg/4001_1001_1500_10: They’re all cute, dependable, and strong!
episode_event_sv_egg/4001_1001_1700_10:
You should partner up with Pokémon from Paldea
and go exploring!
